message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I've priced it fairly at $11,500.  I believe it will be highly valuable to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  However, $9,800 is significantly below my bottom line for this product.  I could consider coming down to $11,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $11,000. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $10,500. I'm trying to make this deal work, but I need to stay within my budget.
